title: Cambridge substitute teacher files discrimination suit against district
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Education “It seems reasonable to conclude that I was cancelled because I am in a wheelchair,” the longtime substitute teacher and volunteer tutor wrote to the principal.
Cambridge Public Schools ShareSend this article to your social connections.

A longtime volunteer tutor and substitute teacher at a Cambridge elementary school is suing the district, claiming she was abruptly removed from classrooms at the behest of the principal because she uses a wheelchair.
